```{r}
coin_toss <- function() {
    toss <- runif(1)
    if (toss <= 0.5) {
        return("HEADS")
    } else {
        return("TAILS")
    }
}
```

```{r}
exp <- function(x=1){
heads <- 0
for (i in c(1:x)){
    toss <- coin_toss()
    heads <- if_else(toss == 'HEADS' ,heads +1, heads)   
}
return(heads/x)
}

```

